document_data.name: ''Dragonskull Talisman''
document_data.value3e: 4,000 [[gp]]<ref group="note">The market price was revised from 12,000 gp, after the adventure's release, to fit better with the economy of 3e.
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dragonskull talismans''''' were [[enchanted]] [[amulet]]s crated and worn by the members of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
document_data.Description: ''Dragonskull talismans'' were small metallic pendants, shaped to resemble a [[dragon]]'s skull.
document_data.Powers: These amulets' powers were activated via uttering the command words. The wearer became completely invisible to [[undead]] creatures, along with up two other creatures as long as they remain in physical contact. This effect was similar to that of the ''[[hide from undead]]'' spell. The effect lasted for up to thirty minutes.
document_data.Creation: A skilled wondrous item crafter could create a ''dragonskull talisman'' with the use of the ''hide from undead'' spell.
document_data.History: ''Dragonskull talismans'' were created by the Cult of the Dragon to allow non-spell-wielding members of the organization to easily pass minor undead creatures in service of the Culy.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Ellis]]: the guard commander who served the Cult of the Dragon during its occupation of the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]] in [[1369 DR]].
